QuestData.Title: Seeds of the Lashers
QuestData.Description: We need more weapons in the fight against the Scourge. The natural properties of the Emerald Dragonshrine to the southeast may be the answer.$B$BAny unliving creature, save those that Sylvanas has redeemed, that steps foot in the dragonshrine falls to dust.$B$BI want to test a theory, and I want you to be my instrument in doing so, young $r. Go to the Emerald Dragonshrine and take the seeds from the emerald lashers therein.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lord Itharius at the top of Wyrmrest Temple has asked you to return with 3 Lasher Seeds.
QuestData.CompletionText: And just how many seeds have you managed to acquire thus far?
QuestData.RewardText: Even now I can feel the pulse of nature from within these seeds.$B$BWe must put them to good use!
